item.description:
The Story of Johnny Walker

The help screen said to right click the YouTube share tag to embed a video but this does not appear to have worked. So my second attempt was to paste the url as the file location for an image.

item.title: What does it take to create a new malt whisky business? - BBC News
item.description:
What does it take to create a new malt whisky business? - BBC News

"Once you're selling everything you make, it's a licence to print money," says whisky consultant Jim Swan. Mr Swan, who advises distilleries around the world, is talking about Scotland's prized single malt whiskies. Considered by most whisky aficionados to be the pinnacle of the industry, single malts are whiskies made from a single distillery using only malted barley.
